ovdesc.p: This application is simply used to group related companies together.
It consists of a description field and a multi valued set of company codes.
The key to these records can then be used in other applications such as USER to avoid having to key in large numbers of company codes.
Also maintenance of the company group can be restricted to a single record.

This field identifies a COMPANY.SMS.GROUP record used to group related companies.
This can be used as input in the OTH.BOOK.ACCESS or OTH.BOOK.BLOCK fields of the user record to avoid have to input large numbers of companies in each record.
When a USER record with a COMPANY.SMS.GROUP record defined is read into memory then the companies present will be copied into the USER record.
So it is possible to modify these records and avoid having to change individual user records.
